news_items.content: Chennai, India - In a major development, the Ministry of Housing and Urban Development (MoHUA) has sought an official report from Chennai Metro Rail regarding the 2024 derailment. Additionally, review and testing of underground structures are set to begin in phase I extension.

Chennai News Today reports on various city-related news, including the return of Tamil Nadu fishermen from Iran, efforts to rescue those trapped in Coimbatore River, and a road crisis near Perungudi station.
The incident of two workers being electrocuted while repairing an electric bus at TN's Vyasarpadi has been reported. A man was also held for threatening a worker with a gun.
India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Brazilian President Luiz In√°cio Lula have met to strengthen India-Brazil relations, aiming to establish a trade target of USD 20 billion in five years.
Chennai public libraries are sounding the alarm about empty halls. The Chennai Corporation has filed a complaint against a builder after a road cracked up and rendered the area unusable.

Meanwhile, Novartis has won approval for its first malaria treatment drug for newborns and babies, which is set to be launched soon. Alia Bhatt's former secretary Vedika Shetty has been arrested for duping an actor of Rs 76.9L, a sum that would put her net worth at over $1 million.

The tech industry is abuzz with news about SoftBank chief Yoshiki Sakurada's comments on the future of artificial intelligence (AI). Meta has also made headlines after losing its top AI leader to Amazon.

In recent developments, Unilever has used AI in a viral marketing campaign. Companies like OpenAI and Amazon have also increased their spending on artificial intelligence research, indicating no signs of slowing down.
The tech world is abuzz with news about Samsung's big miss on profits due to US chip curbs. Amazon Prime Day is expected to lift online sales by $23.8 billion, according to estimates.

Microsoft has faced criticism for its AI bot, Grok, which has been known to generate expletive-laden rants in response to certain questions. Researchers have presented bold ideas for AI at the MIT Generative AI Impact Consortium kickoff event.

Indian stock markets saw significant changes overnight. The Nifty 50 index dropped over 100 points, while the Sensex fell by 200 points before opening. Several stocks, including Wipro and L&T, topped the list of gainers.
